messages.text:
LGTM
 On Jul 3, 2013 7:22 AM, <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.**blog <https://code.google.com/p/go.blog>
>
>
> Description:
> go.blog/content/race-detector: s/MacOS/OS X/.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/10904044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/10904044/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M content/race-detector.article
>
>
> Index: content/race-detector.article
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/content/race-detector.**article
> +++ b/content/race-detector.**article
> @@ -18,10 +18,10 @@
>  We're happy to announce that Go 1.1 includes a
>  [[http://golang.org/doc/**articles/race_detector.html][**race<http://golang.org/doc/articles/race_detector.html%5D%5Brace>detector]],
>  a new tool for finding race conditions in Go code.
> -It is currently available for Linux, MacOS, and Windows systems
> +It is currently available for Linux, OS X, and Windows systems
>  with 64-bit x86 processors.
>
> -The race detector is based on the  C/C++
> +The race detector is based on the C/C++
>  [[https://code.google.com/p/**thread-sanitizer/][**ThreadSanitizer<https://code.google.com/p/thread-sanitizer/%5D%5BThreadSanitizer>runtime library]],
>  which has been used to detect many errors in Google's internal code base
> and in
>  [[http://www.chromium.org/][**Chromium]<http://www.chromium.org/%5D%5BChromium%5D>
> ].
>
>
> --
>
> ---You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google
> Groups "golang-dev" group.
> To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an
> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@**googlegroups.com<golang-dev%2Bunsubscribe@googlegroups.com>
> .
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/**groups/opt_out<https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out>
> .
>
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=12d9f77d2709&repo=blog ***

go.blog/content/race-detector: s/MacOS/OS X/.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10904044

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog
